51.content: I am trying to Remove Paint from Windows. First, I you will need a bucket of hot water mixed with dish soap, a clean cloth or sponge, a new safety razor blade and some glass cleaner. Then, I wet the window with the water and dish soap. Then, I position the razor blade. Then, I using slow, smooth motions, start scraping the paint from the window. Then, I once all of the paint has been scraped away, spritz the window with some glass cleaner and use a clean, dry cloth to buff the windows clean. Then, I remove small paint splatters with chemical solvents. Do you get it?
